summary: Completed comprehensive testing of slide editor fixes. All requested features are working correctly including Back button navigation, Export PNG functionality, CTA slide with glass effect background container, and Body slide with text background container.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate)
Dashboard loads successfully with 12 existing projects
Back button navigation works (redirects to dashboard)
Export PNG button visible and functional (shows 'Exported!' toast)
CTA slide creation with variant 1 (Link style)
CTA slide has glass effect background container (backdrop-blur-sm bg-black/20)
Body slide has text background container (bg-black/40 with border)
Slide type switching between CTA and Body works correctly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (10/10 features tested successfully)
